kpi.name: M1034C6

kpi_info.title: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR PS REL99 DCH DL PER OPER
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU data transferred in the RT PS DCH and NRT DCH in the downlink direction during the measurement interval. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals, and when the connection is released or the active set is changed.

kpi.kpi_alias: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR PS REL99 DCH DL PER OPER
